ai-thag5.6:1.1_0: It was truly for my benefit
ai-thag5.6:1.2_0: that the Buddha went to the river Nerañjara.
ai-thag5.6:2.1_0: I used to perform a diverse spectrum of sacrifices;
ai-thag5.6:3.1_0: Caught in the thicket of wrong view,
ai-thag5.6:4.3_0: I meditate dependent on a fire.
ai-thag5.6:4.4_0: I bow to the Realized One.
ai-thag5.6:5.2_0: craving for continued existence is shattered;
ai-thag5.6:5.4_0: now there’ll be no more future lives.”
